name: Chain Slinger
description:
Chain slinger

In this bullet hell, you are chained together with your weapon. You can de-attach the weapon and launch it towards the enemies. 

Pro tip: try making the ball orbit around the character and then de-attach to launch it.

Controls

Use arrow keys to move around

Use space bar to de-attach the ball from the chain

Credit

Made for the GMTK Jam 2021 with the theme "joined together"

By:

- Tobias Sønderbo

- Frederik Østergaard
